definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Do not coin terms that are intelligible to nobody.
sentences.chinese: 不要生造誰也不懂的術語。

sentences.english: We should make a difference between new words and coinages.
sentences.chinese: 對新詞和生造詞要區別對待。

definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
facing a wall, an imaginary construction (idiom); baseless fabrication
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
to make things up/to concoct (a story, an excuse etc)
